      • validateLHSAndRHSDataTypesCompatibility

        public static boolean validateLHSAndRHSDataTypesCompatibility(ClipboardPage aPage,
                                                              PublicAPI tools)
        Compares LHS and RHS data types of Policy Condition. Adds error message to Rule-Access-PolicyConditon primary page if there is any error
        Parameters:
        aPage - is Rule-Access-PolicyConditon primary page
        tools - is execution context
        Returns:
        return true if there is any error message on primary page , otherwise return false

      • validateRuleInPersonalRS

        public static boolean validateRuleInPersonalRS(ClipboardPage aPage,
                                               PublicAPI tools)
        Validate Policy Condition in proper rulset or in personal ruleset. Add warning message to primary page if there the policy condition is in personal ruleset
        Parameters:
        aPage - is Rule-Access-PolicyConditon primary page
        tools - is execution context
        Returns:
        return true the policy condition is in personal ruleset , otherwise return false
